info.title: SenseHome-Technologies API Users
info.description: The purpose of the API developed is to manage the users of a system, including registration, authentication and information management functions.

delete.summary: This endpoint allows a user to be deleted from the database using a JWT token and user ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user to be deleted

put.summary: This endpoint allows a user to edit their information in the database.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This endpoint allows a user to edit their information in the database.

post.summary: This endpoint allows a user to request a password reset link to be sent to their email.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This endpoint allows a user to request a password reset link to be sent to their email.

post.summary: This endpoint allows a user to register by providing their username, email, and password. If the credentials are valid, a JWT token is returned to the user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This endpoint allows a user to register by providing their username, email, and password. If the credentials are valid, a JWT token is returned to the user.

post.summary: This endpoint allows a user to reset their password by providing a valid JWT token and a new password.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This endpoint allows a user to reset their password by providing a valid JWT token and a new password.

post.summary: This endpoint allows a user to log in by providing their email and password. If the credentials are valid, a JWT token is returned to the user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This endpoint allows a user to log in by providing their email and password. If the credentials are valid, a JWT token is returned to the user.

post.summary: This endpoint verifies the verification code provided by the user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This endpoint verifies the verification code provided by the user.

id.description: Id of the user to be deleted

profilephoto.description: New profile photo of the user

phonetoken.description: New phone token of the user

message.description: Password reset link sent to the user via email

verificationcode.description: Verification code provided by the user
